reviewText: I really enjoyed watching the DVD. The quality of the episodes are in excellent condition. They are almost as if you were to watch the episodes on television. The video quality is the same, as well as the sound. They've included songs that sometimes run into the starting scenes.
Buenisima esta recopilacion de lo mejor de Don Ramon, uno de los pricipales personajes comicos de la Vecindad del Chavo, con este dvd pasaras momentos de mucha diversion.
this is not the video that came, the picture of the man here has a bandaid on his head and a black eye, ours that came does not and we already have the one that came
Me gustan mucho los programas del chavo super divertidos, la compra fue muy rapida y a precio barato
Came on time quality of video was great
This tribute to Ramon Valdez is one of the best, and funniest moments ever brought to Spanish television. You'll want to watch it again, and again.

It's a great DVD and if you're wild about Don Ramon like I am, You'll love this too!
Yes it's edited, but as I said before If you're wild about Don Ramon, this is for you!

Great service!!! The order was 100% accurate and it was fast.
I gave this item 5 stars because I did not have any problems, the product was what I had read and hopped for.

I have been a fan of this mexican comedy since long time ago! Don Ramon is my fav character of them all, he is so hilarious. The episodes on this DVD are so funny. I absolutely recommend this if you want to spend a couple hours of laugh. ^_^
